markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wolfsbane](/Equipment.aspx?ID=131)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Ingested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 553 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 155 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Wolfsbane appears in folklore for its link to [werecreatures](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=100). If you are afflicted with lycanthropy and survive **Stage 3** of wolfsbane, you're immediately cured of the lycanthropy.

**Saving Throw** DC 30 Fortitude; **Onset** 10 minutes; **Maximum Duration** 6 minutes; **Stage 1** 12d6 poison damage (1 minute); **Stage 2** 16d6 poison damage (1 minute); **Stage 3** 20d6 poison damage (1 minute)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Wolfsbane
